TopicTitle: Craft Scavenger - Use only others' crafts to complete the Jool-5!

Articles.Content:
Craft Scavenger

Use only others' crafts to complete the Jool-5!

Overview:

You must complete the Jool-5 challenge using only crafts created by other people to do things other than the Jool-5 challenge.

Rules:

You must complete the Jool-5 challenge as described here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57197-The-Ultimate-Jool-5-Challenge-land-Kerbals-on-all-moons-and-return-in-one-big-mission

You must not use any crafts that you have created or requested the creation of. All crafts used must be downloaded from external authors.

No more than one craft file can be downloaded from each author.

The only 'in-VAB' or 'in-SPH' modification of crafts allowed is to attach crafts to one another (changing root parts or converting to subassemblies is kosher).

Anything used as a moon lander must not have been designed specifically to land on that moon.

Any interplanetary or "intermoonar" transfer stage must not have been designed specifically to be a transfer stage. Omitted because of insane difficulty.

The Kerbin launch stage must not have been designed specifically to lift a Jool-5 challenge vessel.

Submission:

Post your submission on this thread along with any images or videos you want, and for each craft file used, include a link to the page you got each from, the name of the author, what you used it for, and the original purpose.

You may also want to submit your entry to http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57197-The-Ultimate-Jool-5-Challenge-land-Kerbals-on-all-moons-and-return-in-one-big-mission

Where can I find craft files?

KerbalTek's Craft Kitchen

The Spacecraft Exchange on the KSP forums

Edited March 26, 2015 by Thunderous Echo
